title: Jatiya Party to distribute nomination forms for election from Dec 17 to 21
body: Jatiya Party has announced that it will distribute nomination forms among party aspirants for the upcoming 13th national parliamentary election. According to a release issued today, the distribution will take place from December 17 to December 21 between 11:00am and 5:00pm at the party's central office in Kakrail, under the direction of Chairman GM Quader. Interviews with nomination aspirants will be conducted on separate dates based on divisions. On December 22, interviews will be held for candidates from Rajshahi, Rangpur, and Sylhet divisions. On December 23, aspirants from Khulna, Barishal, and Mymensingh divisions will be interviewed. On December 24, interviews will be conducted for candidates from Dhaka and Chattogram divisions. The party said the final list of candidates will be published on December 25.
